title: !st Clash Winners Club !!!!
body:
Give me a hell yeah and shout out to your team for the 1st clash winners !

Thanks to team leader Paocho and the "winions", wolftit, lordofpie, hawky and meh.
it was the 1st time i played with a team chat and it was fun !

Big ups to Riot on making this happen, GG.

on a side note i got carried.   {{item:3060}}
